inclusion.criterion: Planned chemotherapy with anthracyclines and / or Trastuzumab
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Contra-indications for CMR study (e.g. implanted pacemaker / ICD; severe renal impairment)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Previous history of non-ischemic cardiomyopathies or myocardial inflammation
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 12 year old girl with Turner syndrome, treating with GH since 6 months ago. Mentally retarded and obese.
